casebody.data:
MENDOZA
v.
JPMORGAN CHASE BANK. No. S220675. Supreme Court of California April 27, 2016.

CANTIL-SAKAUYE, C.J., WERDEGAR, CHIN, CORRIGAN, LIU, CUÉLLAR and KRUGER, JJ., concur.

The above-captioned matter is transferred to the Court of Appeal, Third Appellate District, with directions to vacate its decision and to reconsider the cause in light of Yvanova v. New Century Mortgage Corp. (2016) 62 Cal.4th 919, 199 Cal.Rptr.3d 66, 365 P.3d 845. (Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.528(d).)
